user_profile.name: Kwame Nkrumah
user_profile.description: Kwame Nkrumah, a 48-year-old expert in technology, navigates his daily life with cautious decision-making and an adaptive communication style. Residing in an office environment, he is currently focused on arranging home modifications for the elderly, motivated by his own limited mobility experiences, which have made him acutely aware of the importance of accessibility and safety. His reserved demeanor paired with a very expressive personality allows him to connect with diverse individuals while still carefully considering every detail.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Personal hygiene and safety in bathrooms
General ease of movement in common areas
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local home improvement stores and specialized online retailers
additional_requirements: Approval from family members or caregivers

examples: I need a smartphone with a good camera and decent battery life. Something reliable for everyday use.
Looking for a gaming laptop that can handle new releases. I'd prefer something with a good display.
Can you recommend a home security system? We have a medium-sized house and would need outdoor coverage.
